sentences.en: A radio is an accessory to a car.
sentences.cn: 收音机是汽车的附件.

sentences.en: a set of fully matching clothes and accessories
sentences.cn: 一套完全相配的衣服和饰物

sentences.en: an accessory to murder
sentences.cn: 谋杀案的帮凶

sentences.en: An element or accessory of a line printer that receives and stacks printout.
sentences.cn: 宽行打印机的一种部件或附件，用以接收和堆放打印输出纸张。

sentences.en: bathroom accessories such as mirrors and towel-rails
sentences.cn: 镜子和毛巾架等浴室配件

sentences.en: Connect red lead to accessory power supply of car.
sentences.cn: 连接红色导线到汽车的辅助电源.

sentences.en: Forster established the essentiality of minerals as accessory food factors required for maintaining life.
sentences.cn: 福斯特证实了矿物质作为辅助食物因子在维持生命方面的重要性。

sentences.en: He was an accessory to the murder.
sentences.cn: 他是那件谋杀案的从犯.

sentences.en: He was arrested on suspicion of being an accessory to the crime.
sentences.cn: 他因涉嫌同谋犯罪被捕.

sentences.en: He was charged with being an accessory to murder.
sentences.cn: 他被控为谋杀罪的从犯.

sentences.en: He was charged with being an accessory to the crime.
sentences.cn: 他被控告为这项罪行的从犯.

sentences.en: He was indicted as being accessory man to the crime.
sentences.cn: 他被指控为该罪的同谋者.

sentences.en: He was made accessory to the crime.
sentences.cn: 他被利用同谋犯罪.

sentences.en: He's booked as an accessory.
sentences.cn: 他被控为同谋犯.

sentences.en: It was an accessory food supply.
sentences.cn: 它提供辅助的食物.

sentences.en: Mr Smith was believed to be an accessory to the murder.
sentences.cn: 史密斯被认为是该谋杀案的从犯.

sentences.en: She was charged with being an accessory to the embezzlement of funds.
sentences.cn: 她被指控为这起挪用公款案的从犯。

sentences.en: the accessory muscles of respiration
sentences.cn: 副呼吸肌

sentences.en: The company serves the national automotive aftermarket with a broad range of accessory and recreational-vehicle products.
sentences.cn: 该公司为全国汽车零配件市场提供各种零配件和休闲旅游车产品。

sentences.en: Weightless and stylish, the V 3 Bluetooth headset an accessory of beautiful purpose.
sentences.cn: 失重和时尚, v3蓝牙耳机,是从犯美丽的目的.

phrases.tran_cn: (律 旧)（怂恿或协助犯罪或故意帮助犯罪人的）事前（或事后）从犯

trans.tran_en: not the most important when compared to others

trans.tran_cn: 附件，配件，配饰，从犯，同谋
trans.tran_en: something such as a piece of equipment or a decoration that is not necessary, but that makes a machine, car, room etc more useful or more attractive
